subject: Football
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. fined New England Patriots Coach Bill Belichick $50,000 and the Washington Redskins assistant Kyle Shanahan $25,000 on Wednesday for their conduct toward replacement officials.
snippet: The N.F.L. fined New England Patriots Coach Bill Belichick $50,000 and the Washington Redskins assistant Kyle Shanahan $25,000 on Wednesday for their conduct toward replacement officials.
